dct_description_sm: Relief shown by contours and spot heights. Depths shown by bathymetric tints. Map of Antarctica showing coastline, ice shelves, glaciated areas, rock outcrops, elevation points, subglacial lake outlines, regional boundaries, main facilities (stations, camps & refuges). Landsat satellite image mosaic map of central Dronning Maud Land as background map. South Shetland Islands facilities are listed. "Shaded relief vertically exaggerated". "Data courtesy of COMNAP, IHO-IOC, NOAA, NSIDC, SCAR, USGS and others." Includes legend and list of abbreviations. Includes ancillary location map.
